form_prediction.title: Lung Cancer Risk Assessment

questions.anxiety: Do you feel anxious at times?
questions.peer_pressure: Do you feel peer pressure from family, work, or other groups?
questions.chronic_disease: Do you have any chronic diseases?
questions.fatigue: Have you been feeling fatigued lately?
questions.wheezing: Do you wheeze when breathing deeply?
questions.shortness_of_breath: Do you experience shortness of breath?
questions.chest_pain: Have you recently felt chest pain?

form_prediction.warning_unanswered: Please answer all questions before proceeding.

results.title: Result:
results.high: High risk: {risk}% probability of having lung cancer.
results.medium: Medium risk: {risk}% probability of having lung cancer.
results.low: Low risk: {risk}% probability of having lung cancer.
